author: Annie Nova
title: This Uber driver made $600 a week before the coronavirus outbreak — now he makes $0
description: As the coronavirus pandemic shuts down businesses and forces people to stay home, many ride share drivers for Uber and Lyft have watched income come to a halt.
content: Earlier this month, as talk of a new virus outbreak in the U.S. revved up, Robert Richwine, an Uber driver in Columbus, Ohio, devised a game plan to try to stay on the road. After dropping off each rider, he sprayed disinfectant on "anything the passenger mig… [+3518 chars]
